title: FaceFixer — AI Skincare Assistant
description: Built an AI-powered skincare assistant using YOLOv11 for face detection, integrated with a Spring Boot API, and deployed image storage on AWS S3.

title: Swiftiply — AI Reply Extension
description: Developed a privacy-first browser extension for Chrome/Firefox that generates context-aware replies using GPT API, built with TypeScript and React.

title: Urban Heat Island Analysis
description: Analyzed city-scale climate data to identify urban heat islands, using regression modeling, Pandas, and spatial data visualization dashboards.
